Class Nio2Endpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tomcat.util.net.AbstractEndpoint<S,U>
      • org.apache.tomcat.util.net.AbstractJsseEndpoint<Nio2Channel,java.nio.channels.AsynchronousSocketChannel>
        • org.apache.tomcat.util.net.Nio2Endpoint

  • public class Nio2Endpoint
extends AbstractJsseEndpoint<Nio2Channel,java.nio.channels.AsynchronousSocketChannel>
    NIO2 endpoint.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Nio2Endpoint.Nio2Acceptor

      static class  Nio2Endpoint.SendfileData
      SendfileData class.
      protected class  Nio2Endpoint.SocketProcessor
      This class is the equivalent of the Worker, but will simply use in an external Executor thread pool.
